book.descrip.hexparse:focus2code: Reads data from the focus I'm holding, and prints parsed code into chat menu.$(br)Can only be casted by staff.
book.descrip.hexparse:code2focus: Reads code from my local clipboard, then parse it into the focus I'm holding.$(br)Can only be casted by staff.
book.descrip.hexparse:remove_comments: Clears all comment iotas in a list, returns processed list.
